request.description: For a given group, finds the Access Control Rules that match at least one member of the group. In this example, "HR-Managers-Server" object is a member of the "HR" group, and therefore rules which contain this object will not be matched.

response.name: show-access-rulebase-with-filter-expand-group-members

originalRequest.description: For a given group, finds the Access Control Rules that match at least one member of the group. In this example, "HR-Managers-Server" object is a member of the "HR" group, and therefore rules which contain this object will not be matched.

item.name: show-access-rulebase with filter expand group with exclusion members

request.description: For a given Group with Exclusion, shows the Access Control Rules that match at least one member of the "include" part and is not a member of the "except" part. In this example, the group-with-exclusion "HR except Managers" contains the "HR" group in "include" parameter and the "Managers" in the "except" parameter. HR-Managers-Server object is a member of both "HR" and "Managers", and therefore rules which contain this object will not be matched. HR-Employees-Server is a member of "HR" and not a member of "Managers" and therefore rules that contain this object will be matched.

response.name: show-access-rulebase with filter expand group with exclusion members

originalRequest.description: For a given Group with Exclusion, shows the Access Control Rules that match at least one member of the "include" part and is not a member of the "except" part. In this example, the group-with-exclusion "HR except Managers" contains the "HR" group in "include" parameter and the "Managers" in the "except" parameter. HR-Managers-Server object is a member of both "HR" and "Managers", and therefore rules which contain this object will not be matched. HR-Employees-Server is a member of "HR" and not a member of "Managers" and therefore rules that contain this object will be matched.
